data.prayer: Father, help your children in Hedmark, Norway find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hedmark, Norway
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Hedmark, Norway.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Hedmark, Norway to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 182,145 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Hedmark with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Bosniak people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Bosniak people know you.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Hedmark, Norway.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Hedmark, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Hedmark a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Hedmark
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Norwegian-speaking, Somali, South Asian, general, Kurd, Kurmanji, Estonian
